name: Kitt Technology
slogan: Spaces as platforms for people and their purposes
description:
- An automated office environment to efficiently manage our spaces:
  - An app to communicate with tenants and allow them to access services such as meeting rooms.
  - Facial recognition and app-controlled door entry system.
  - Back-office tools to enable a remote receptionist.
- A marketplace app to connect potential tenants and their next perfect office space.
- An interactive VR/AR experience to view and design our spaces, without esoteric CAD software.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Steve Coulson
team.bioHtml: CFO at JustPark - I love working with smart people to solve difficult problems

team.title: Technical Lead
team.name: Tim Coulson
team.bioHtml: Head of Tech at Kitt. Previously backend lead at JustPark.

jobs.title: Business Development Executive
jobs.description:
Welcome! We’re Kitt, a start-up in the flexible office world offering a new model to the market that’s set to disrupt the industry! We’re on a mission to transform property into thriving workspaces that are optimised to help businesses grow. We’re also a well funded start-up in the early stages, backed by one of London’s major prop-tech investors. In addition we now have our Chairman - previous CEO of Fitness First.

We partner with landlords to provide our tenants with tailored managed offices that they can call their own; using the latest technology to help digitise the space (such as facial recognition door entry, virtual receptionists, and VR viewings to name a few). We’re leading the charge in an unexplored segment of the market and hope that you can help us!

Our commercial team is led by our Co-Founders previously with JustPark. You’d be joining a small sales team with ambitious plans!

Our team is growing rapidly and we’re looking for passionate, ambitious and target driven individuals to join us.


We are looking for an ambitious Business Development Executive that cares passionately about providing a fantastic customer experience and is excited about driving the business forward. Experience in flexible office space or commercial property is desirable.

You will be responsible for managing the entire sales process for a portfolio of available spaces. You will help to manage the process from marketing to closed deals.

Representing the Kitt brand by building great relationships with brokers and clients
Matching broker leads to our portfolio and liaising with brokers to arrange viewings
Generating and negotiating deals, taking them through the funnel to closed
Interacting with our CRM, updating leads as necessary
Continually improving processes and our sales methodology
Achieving realistic sales targets


Ideally you will have 18 months’ experience in sales; this role requires a self-starter with high motivation, we’re a young start-up and support each other in our roles as necessary.



Your essential skills:

Proven sales professional with experience of driving and closing deals
Highly organised, focused and disciplined with the ability to prioritise effectively in a busy environment
Natural communicator and influencer, sociable and bonds easily with others
Energetic and hard working
Self-motivated, taking the initiative
Ambitious, driven to succeed, and wants to grow with the company
Comfortable with technology, processes and systems
To become a part of the team you must be passionate, enthusiastic, willing to learn and values driven. We know that experience is important, but attitude and finding the right ‘fit’ comes first for us.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
Welcome to Kitt

Office space. Long story short, disrupting office space typically invokes imagery of a very specific tech company. We’re here to really level things up- think VR viewings, facial recognition at the door and your own truly bespoke office.

Why do this? Well- finding, moving into and occupying office space is still a terrible experience. Our co-founders built Kitt to rectify that and we have incredible investors who’ve backed us on the journey to realise that vision.

We connect landlords and prospective tenants through our platform and create a seamless office experience. Small team, huge impact- the best time to join is pretty much now.

What you'll be doing:

Bringing landlords onto the Kitt proposition - building a pipeline and generating sales. Scaling up our space acquisition will be key to the success of Kitt as we grow.

Build a pipeline of targets
Organise and attend sales meetings
Build sales materials
Some commercial modelling of sales opportunities
Closing deals
Working with sales and marketing teams to build strategic sales pitch for each opportunity
Attend networking events


Who you are:

Tenacious
Wants to succeed
Strong business development / sales skills and numbers to back this up.
Must have a degree ideally 2:1
Have contacts in the industry already
Numerically comfortable
Articulate
Driven
Competitive
Consultative
Smart
Demonstrated interest in proptech and the flex / managed / serviced office market

What you’ll be good at:

Can talk confidently about Kitt
Presentation skills
Ability to sell / pitch at a C-Suite level
Represent Kitt in a professional and credible manner.
Time management
Interpersonal skills
Commercial property experience + contacts
2 years within landlord sales / commercial real-estate.
Strong knowledge of Google Docs - desirable

jobs.title: Fullstack Engineer
jobs.description:
We’re now looking to make our second technical hire to bring exceptional front end and product experience to the team. Given the early stage of the business, we’re looking for someone who can confidently approach every level of the stack and help us shape the product itself. If you are looking to use technology to make a large impact on an industry, this is an ideal opportunity for you.

Key responsibilities

- Own the front end development of our native apps and web products.
- Take responsibility for the UI/UX of the product.
- Ensuring front end features are well covered by unit and integration tests.
- Ensure our style and brand is used consistently across platforms.

You are someone with:

- Extensive commercial experience of front end development within a team.
- Experience building apps with React, and React Native ideally.
- Proven experience developing cross-browser, cross-platform responsive web pages.
- Experience making changes to API endpoints, we use Golang on the backend.
- A degree in Computer Science, Engineering or other technical discipline.
- Experience testing at various levels of abstraction: E2E, integration, unit, snapshot.

Our Stack

- Frontend: React, React Native + Flow with MobX.
- Backend: Golang and gRPC.
- Declarative CI/CD pipelines with Concourse.
- Terraform for codified infrastructure.
- Kubernetes with dash of Helm for orchestration.
- Prometheus for monitoring.

Benefits

- Generous stock options.
- Unlimited holiday.
- Laptop of your choice.
- A yearly allowance for personal training and development.
- Daily team lunch on Leather Lane.
- Quarterly team Away Days.
